{{also|weiss|Weiss|Weiß|wéiss}} ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|weiss}} {{qualifier|Switzerland|Liechtenstein}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|wīz}}, from {{inh|de|goh|wīz}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*hwītaz}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*ḱweytos||bright; shine}}. Compare {{cog|nl|wit}}, {{cog|en|white}}, {{cog|da|hvid}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[vaɪs]}} * {{audio|de|De-weiß.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|aɪ̯s}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|weißer|weißesten}} # [[white]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|weiß|weißer|weißest}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|schwarz}} ====Related terms==== {{top2}} * {{l|de|dunkelweiß}} * {{l|de|hellweiß}} * {{l|de|Weißbuch}} * {{l|de|Weiße}} * {{l|de|Weiße Magie}} * {{l|de|Weißes Meer}} * {{l|de|weißen}} * {{l|de|Weißer Nil}} {{mid2}} * {{l|de|Weißer}} * {{l|de|Weißgold}} * {{l|de|weißgrau}} * {{l|de|weißlich}} * {{l|de|Weißmetall}} * {{l|de|Weißrussland}} * {{l|de|Weißwein}} * {{l|de|Weizen}} {{bottom}} ===Verb=== {{head|de|verb form}} # {{de-verb form of|wissen|1|s|g}} #: {{ux|de|{{l|de|ich|Ich}} '''weiß''' das bereits.|I already '''know''' that.}} #: {{ux|de|{{l|de|ich|Ich}} '''weiß''' {{l|de|nicht}}.|I do not '''know'''.}} # {{de-verb form of|wissen|3|s|g}} #: {{ux|de|{{l|de|er|Er}} '''weiß''' das bereits.|He already '''knows''' that.}} #: {{ux|de|{{l|de|er|Er}} '''weiß''' {{l|de|nicht}}.|He does not '''know'''.}} [[Category:de:Colors]]
